name: DELETED:7400 Avoid undocumented functions and procedures
description: Functions and procedures should have comments
output:
This report lists all Functions or procedures  with no documentation.
It provides the following information: Function full name
rationale: Maintainability of the code is facilitated with a documentation in the code. This rule will ensure there are comments within the Artifact,
remediation: Enrich functions and procedures code with meaningful comments
